faq.title: [KO] Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: [KO] Yes! All core features are completely free. Premium tiers unlock extras like Music and AI chat.
faq.q2: [KO] How do I set up the bot?
faq.a2: [KO] Click 'Add to Server', select your server, and you're done! Use the dashboard to customize.
faq.a3: [KO] Extensions are custom commands you can create or install from the community gallery.
